div.p: What you see on the right is a mindmap model presented by the application.
The app's design based on MVP pattern; the nodes, or bubbles, are regular widgets but the relation arrows are rendered on a HTML5 Canvas.

p.i: TODO: maybe SVG would be better, SVG would allow mouse events on the arrows.

div.p: The bubbles lay out themselves via css positioning; upon layout change (one of the nodes changes size, nodes added or deleted) a Canvas repaint is fired to update the arrows.
